content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Hello James, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on our discussion, we have determined a rental price of 800 Euros per month. Would you agree to this price?
name: James Smith

content:
I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?

Please note that I am the landlord, so the final decision is mine.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand, Mr. Heine. I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month instead. Is this acceptable to you?
name: James Smith

content:
I would like to counterpropose a rental price of 750 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?

Please note that I am the landlord, so the final decision is mine.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand, Mr. Heine. I would like to counterpropose a rental price of 750 Euros per month instead. Is this acceptable to you?
name: James Smith
